name: grail-hunter
title: Grail Hunter - Phase 4.2: GOAT & StockX Hybrid Intelligence
description: Aggregates sneaker listings from 8 platforms (Grailed, eBay, StockX, GOAT, Depop, Poshmark, Mercari, OfferUp) with hybrid scraping strategy (orchestrated actors + dataset ingestion), deal scoring, price tracking, and real-time alerts. ⚠️ HIGH RISK: GOAT/StockX require explicit opt-in and may violate ToS. Dataset ingestion recommended.
